 Sets the bound-checking flag, so that invariant mass pairs are sampled until they obey energy conservation.
void Camorra::unset_check_bounds ()
 Unsets the bound-checking flag, so that invariant mass pairs are thrown once, with weight zero if energy consrvation is violated.
